hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.subtitle: Frontend Developer
hero.description: Crafting digital experiences across the digital universe. Specializing in modern web technologies and user interfaces.

about.title: About My
about.paragraph1: Welcome to my corner of the digital cosmos! I'm a passionate developer who explores the infinite possibilities of web technology, creating stellar user experiences that transcend ordinary boundaries.
about.paragraph2: With 3 years of experience navigating the vast universe of frontend development, I specialize in React, Vue, Wordpress, TypeScript, and Three.js - the perfect toolkit for building immersive, space-age applications that captivate and inspire.
about.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me stargazing, exploring new technologies, or contemplating the mysteries of the digital universe. Ready to embark on an extraordinary journey together?

projects.title: My
projects.description: Explore my constellation of digital creations, where innovative technology meets cosmic creativity to deliver extraordinary user experiences.

skills.title: My
skills.description: My technological toolkit spans across multiple galaxies of development, from frontend frameworks to 3D experiences and beyond.

seo.title: Cosmic Developer - Space-Age Portfolio
seo.description: Professional cosmic portfolio showcasing stellar web development skills, interstellar projects, and experience with React, TypeScript, and Three.js across the digital universe
seo.author: Cosmic Developer

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Ready to launch your next digital adventure? Let's connect and explore the infinite possibilities of the web together.
contact.connectDescription: Whether you have a cosmic vision that needs bringing to life, or you're looking for a developer to join your mission, I'm here to help make it happen.
